title: People people
brief_description: Designed to encourage excellence for people involved in customer service. It demonstrates how people in customer service can derive great personal satisfaction in their work by taking positive professional attitude to the people they are serving. Useful in the commerce frameworks area of Business Studies for Years 9 and 10. Also a valuable video for briefing students undergoing work experience in customer service related industry.
